definition: a periodic state during which you are conscious and aware of the world
details:
noun
- a periodic state during which you are conscious and aware of the world
= example: a periodic state during which you are conscious and aware of the world
- the process of paying close and continuous attention
= example: the process of paying close and continuous attention
= synonyms: alertness
- a temporary state in which you are unable (or unwilling) to sleep
= example: a temporary state in which you are unable (or unwilling) to sleep
= synonyms: sleeplessness
